definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess
crushed or broken rock, stone etc
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
lit. torn body and crushed bones (idiom)/fig. to die horribly/to sacrifice one's life

sentences.english: Officials say new information led to the remains at what is believed to be the crash site.
sentences.chinese: 官方人員稱新信息領導着剩餘的被認爲在撞碎的地方。

sentences.english: And then stir in the cheese and bread crumbs.
sentences.chinese: 之後加入奶酪和麪包碎攪拌。

sentences.english: H shut the window with such force that the glass broke.
sentences.chinese: 他關窗子用了那麼大的勁，玻璃都碎了。

sentences.english: Harris removes it and smashes it on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 哈里斯拿掉了這個裝置，並用腳踩碎在地上。

sentences.english: Though thou shouldst bray a fool in the mortar, as when a pestle striketh upon sodden barley, his folly would not be taken from him.
sentences.chinese: 你儘可在臼中將愚人舂碎，但他的昏愚卻永不能剷除。

sentences.english: When the steel was placed in ice water and hit with a hammer, it shattered.
sentences.chinese: 當鋼鐵被安放在冰水中並用錘子敲打時，它碎掉了。

sentences.english: 1951 saw the first commercial egg breaking machines.
Tomato, mozzerella, basil, olive tepanade drizzle.
sentences.chinese: 蕃茄，奶汁食品，羅勒，青果碎。

sentences.english: White bean cannelloni salad with red, green, and yellow peppers with tomato concasse.
sentences.chinese: 白豆碎肉沙拉伴紅椒，綠椒和黃椒，番茄碎。

sentences.english: Be broken by wind or have?
His heart broke when his wife died.
sentences.chinese: 他妻子死時他的心都碎了。

sentences.english: Smoke was used to simulate steam coming from a smashed radiator.
sentences.chinese: 用煙來模擬從撞碎的散熱器中冒出的蒸氣。

sentences.english: My Thai chicken recipe calls for ground coriander.
sentences.chinese: 我的泰式燒雞塊需要碎芫荽。

sentences.english: Will you please tidy up all the odds and ends on the table.
sentences.chinese: 請你把桌上那些零瑣細碎的工具都收拾起來吧。

sentences.english: Structure of artificial diamond bit tool influenced efficiency cutting rock. Trapezoidal laminal bit tool was adopted.
sentences.chinese: 金剛石碎巖刀頭的結構影響着碎巖工具的加工效率。

definition: to shatter/to smash/to break into pieces
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
